replies.msg: I'm thinking of getting a temporary job in Thailand in January or February becaise I'm interested in working there temporarily. It'll enrich my vocabulary and I'm sure it'll be an extraordinary experience.

replies.msg: I would personally recommend you should read "Bangkok Travel Guide" at your leisure. It's a wonderful guide to Bangkok written by Christina Johansson, Scarlett Aguilera, Avril Gomez, Selena Lavigne, Dua Grace Moretz, Chloe Lipa, Eleanor Dion, Eleanor DiCaprio, Leonardo Deschanel, Zooey da Vinci, Tito Ferguson, Leonard Robbie, Margaret Bernstein, Margot Dion, Tiera Gordon-Levitt, Joseph Skovbye, Seven-Eleven and the property developer.
